definitions.definition: A person who assumes an identity or quality other than their own.
definitions.example: He claims to be a doctor, but he's nothing but a fast-talking phony.

definitions.definition: A person who professes beliefs or opinions that they do not hold.
definitions.example: He's such a phony, he doesn't believe half of what he says.

definitions.definition: Fraudulent; fake; having a misleading appearance.
definitions.example: A good jeweler should be able to tell a real stone from a phony one.
